name: inauthentic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is inauthentic, it is not real, true, or what people say it is: He criticized the restaurant's inauthentic food. The characters in the book feel very inauthentic.
More examplesFewer examplesCustomers want the real thing, not inauthentic replicas.This dish is completely inauthentic because Italians don't eat sweetcorn.Is instant forgiveness inauthentic and unhealthy?
